description:
TWO BONUS LECTURES added June 12 2015

General update February 9 2015

BONUS lecture added 30 September 2014

This is a 'learn as you paint' workshop. Get stuck in straight away and produce a finished painting as you learn how to use watercolour paints.

Follow each VIDEO DEMONSTRATION for the techniques to complete the painting. Relax and enjoy working as and when it suits you and at your own pace, and see how well one of my students got on with the same picture at the end.

At anytime you can post questions for any advice and also for feedback on your finished painting.

There are also plenty additional notes, professional tips, and extra tuition notes which you can download to build you own 'theory' folder'.

So all you have to do is give yourself a bit of time and enjoy painting.

If, however, you don't enjoy it and are not happy you can claim a full refund within 30 days. No questions asked.
title: Paint this colourful watercolour in 5 easy steps, follow me
